short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Displays Direct Purchase Links to Amazon products to save you money by skipping the middleman. Works on all Amazon websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of inflated Amazon prices? 😫 Deal Direct instantly uncovers lower prices by finding the exact same product directly from the manufacturer. Bypass the Amazon middleman and pocket the savings! 🤑

Key Features & Benefits:

    ⚡ Automatic Savings: Browse Amazon as usual, and we'll quietly search for cheaper, direct-buy options.

    💰 Massive Discounts: Uncover incredible savings of up to 93% compared to Amazon listings.

    ✅ Effortless & Easy to Use: A simple popup alerts you to better prices - it couldn't be easier!

    🔗 Direct Links: Click to go straight to the lower-priced listing – quick, easy, and secure.

    🛒 Manufacturer Marketplace Support: Access deals from top manufacturer sites like AliExpress, Shein, Temu & more!

    🔎 Instant Price Comparison: See in real-time if there’s a better deal out there. No more endless searching!

    🚫 Cut out the Middleman: Avoid markups and buy straight from the source.

    💸 More Money in Your Pocket: Discover discounts on all kinds of products you buy regularly.


How it Works:

    ⬇️ Install: Add Deals Direct Finder to your Chrome browser for free!

    🛍️ Browse Amazon: Shop on Amazon as you normally would.

    🔔 Notification: If a cheaper, direct-buy option exists, a popup will appear with the direct link.

    🔗 Click to Save: You’ll be linked directly to the cheaper listing.

    🥳 Enjoy: Purchase the same product at a fraction of the price!


🔥 Real-Time Deal Examples:

    🔪 Rolling Knife Sharpener: $129.99 on Amazon ➡️ Only $11.58 through Deal Direct!

    🍗 Chicken Shredder: $39.99 on Amazon ➡️ Just $3.89 through Deal Direct!
    These are real deals that users have found, but may change overtime
